content.detailedDescription: My son saw this on his way to work.He drives from denton,by way of the back roads.Its a faster route to work.At aprox.6.50am he turned east on sr.455 from running bear road.He saw bright white lights coming over the hill, on the opposite side of the dam.His first thought was (air craft).He had been in the navy,in the past.He is familiar with aircraft.He started looking for the red and green lights.Not only did he not see them, but it was flying very slow aprox.30 mph.30-50 yards away.It seemed to be hugging the shore line,flying at eye level.He slowed down,opened the car window,observed the craft as is went past.It made no sound at all.Black and gray in color.Delta shape.No bigger than his 1978 thunderbird. rectangular rear,with three large round openings in side.No apparent thrust.No fire, ect.The top of the craft,looked as if it had an extended canopy.Running about three quarters of the way down the fuselage.It was matalic as well.The bottom looked like it had panel lines.As i said, it had three white lights under it.Non blinking!He stopped by the house for a refill on his coffee,told my wife about it,drew a picture of the craft,and wrote down all details, then went off to work.After telling a co-worker at the shop his story,the guy told him he had seen it as well.But thinking people would think he was nuts,didnt say anything.His friend had seen it in sanger.[the town on the other side of the dam.]later the news cast,ran a story on a sighting in stevenville tx.Thay are aprox.60 mi.South of us.The object thay saw,was vary large.I see no comparison to that craft,but wonder if thay are related in some way.All i have to say is , is it one of ours?(this tecnology is out of this world)
content.summary: Delta shape.Aprox 25 ft.Long

content.detailedDescription: I was going home from the convience store east on old hwy 70 and out of the corner of my left eye sight i saw this unearthly object shoot through the lower horizon.  it reminded me of a boat beacon in that is was cylinder shaped standing upright and glowing in two areas.  it's movement was not something familiar as it flew at a quick angle almost parallel to the land but heading down. i felt a familiarity and i really had to search deep in my brain to remember that only 8 or so months prior i had viewed something similiar (but more in number) in the exact same area.  two other folks in my car that first night also viewed the display of objects in the sky.  this area would be near or over the watershed for our region.  i had to continue to search my brain, i mean harder than normal, and i remembered that the local news broadcast that night, the first time i saw it, had reported a story of several people seeing the same lights and that is was a "meteor shower". the second time i saw the object (singular the second time) i felt for sure it was an ufo especially as hard as i had to try to remember the first time i had seen the objects (plural for the first time).  it was really weird how it seemed to try to be suppressed in my memory and how hard i had to try to pull it out! i shared my experience with a few of the locals in the next few days.  no one else saw it the second time that i am aware of.
content.summary: Looked like a greenish blue beacon lite similiar to a boat beacon

content.detailedDescription: I picked up my daughter from babysitting-we were talking in the vehical and i looked up seeing lights- resembling those of a helicopter.I took aviation courses and know what these look like- however-there was no sound and it turned suddenly and flew silently and quickly for 4 or 5 blocks (at about 100 feet up)then stopped when i could no longer follow it with the car because of a dead end. it hovered for a minute and quickly flew off toward the airbase-i snapped a picture with my cell phone cam only to reveal that there was another craft close by i did not see until i took the picture and then both crafts just "disappeared" it was a cloudy night and there were no other crafts or stars. the first object i followed did not have typical red or green aviation lights until it turned toward the second craft- this first object was shaped like a cross with only blue lights then turned in a way to reveal 2 red lights (no flashing) and the second craft appeared as a triangle and only had three lights that i can see. i have a picture on my phone if i could send it you could examine it. please tell me it was a helicopter and small plane! also last week my family and i were driving along highway 2 at night at midnight and saw a fast moving triangle craft we thought was a plane until it made a straight 75 degree turn and stopped then turned again to duck under low laying clouds-it was completely soundless and only about 250 feet above us. i thought it was the new "aircraft" the base has but i never have seen any aircraft move like this and i did not want to jump to conclusions so i say i did not know what it was-but my 4 kids totally freaked!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Wow

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my front yard taking pictures when i noticed that there were 3 jets flying close together.  two were flying side by side up to the left.  another jet flew close to them and then turned and flew straight up and then off to the right.  one of the two flying together, quickly turned around and flew after him at a high rate of speed.  the third jet appear to have turned, but stopped seemed to just disappeared.

i took as many pictures as i could, but i think the best photo i have is the one that (when enlarged) shows a foreign object among the 3 jets.
unfortunatly, this photo is blurry and detail is lost.  but if you concentrate on the jet trails, it is clear that one seems to have just gone missing after the foreign object appears.  

i didn't notice the forgein object until i downloaded the film.  i had originally thought the event was just test pilots.

i have more photos of this event in case you would like to see them, but the first one attached is i believe the only one that includes a foreign object.
content.summary: 3 jets flying....One jet disappeared in mid-flight, on the photo of that...There appears to be a dark forein object in line with jets.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe my conversations with a co worker the previous week to this event had something to do with what happened. i had stated to her that i wish i could see a ufo. that was on friday.

the next monday morning i prepared to leave for work and walked outside, down the steps and toward my car when i suddenly felt compelled to turn 
around and look up over my mothers house.

this thing was sitting still, silent, and it had long bands of light sequincing on the bottom of its stainless appearing shape. as one light would brighten the previous would dim out (about the color of a welders arc only not so bright) it was football shaped looking at it from directly underneath but oval disc would describe it too. it was between 300'& 400' long i would say; half that wide.

as soon as i saw it, i went inside and got my mom and we watched it until our necks became sore. finally, she went inside an said "tell me what it does!"(in her 60's) this thing was just above the pine trees on our block
and was mostly covering our short city block, and i remember thinking others
were seeing it too. it just kept sitting there.

finally, i recall saying out loud, "what is holding it up" "what is powering it; that it can just sit suspended like that" (with no noise)
instantly, a reply came, not out loud.... but just into my mind i guess
like telepathy? "its like magnets you played with as a young person" "remember how the wrong ends repeled?" yes, i answered out loud!
"it has a nuclear powered electromagnetic gyro" came the next.... "oh"

needless to say, i was dumfounded! then the thought process continued"you
were talking about seeing a ufo last week, remember?" "yes" ... i shot back "would you like to go with us?" at that, i became somewhat frightened. i thought back that i would like to but i was frightened and 
was just beginning my life etc. almost as soon as i replied in the negative, the light bands which had been slowly sequencing speeded up. 

after a minute the whole base began to glow and the individual bands were
less decernable. it climbed higher (it was about 100 feet at first)..Maybe it doubled its altitude and stopped again. the river is a block or two away and it probably was directly over it when it stopped. it wobbled a little on its first movement; black smoke wiffed from somewhere on top,(you couldn't see where) and came over the edge in a  
puff. im still looking at the base. as it stopped, higher now, white smoke
wiffed a little from somewhere on top too. then, the whole bottom began to glow, brighter and brighter then superglow..... 

i began moving again just slow southeast; but then it accelerated so quickly you actually couldn't see where it went! i have seen navy jets 
at airshows flying fast low........ the thing i saw went so quickly when in acelerated you actually couldn't follow it with your eyes. it like started southeast but then in just was gone. almost like it disapeared?

i raced back inside and my mother and i called the police and tv stations
etc and asked if they had calls about something unusual and they had no idea what i was talking about. so, we just let it go. what do you do
or who do you tell??? 

i got my wish though! i have sometime watched the ufo shows just to see
if anyone would describe my ufo. sometimes i would hear discussion about
what powers ufo's. i just smile because i have known that since the spring of 1968.

last year or awhile back i heard someone say they are working with
electromagnetics @ oak ridge. i guess you can imagine, that caught my ear!

i also hope there might be someone out there who will read this and know
it is truthful! (smile) thanks for the format!
content.summary: Large ufo stationary 100 ft off ground directly overhead for15 to 18 min 6:00a

content.detailedDescription: I am just reporting several sightings in the stephenville/dublin texas area in the last few days, as widely reported in the press by creditable observers - a search of "stephenville texas ufo" or "dublin texas ufo" will show the news article(s), the object was observed and reported by enough people that it might warrent investigation. once again, i have not personally seen this object, however the reports of the "lighting" are simlar to a previous personal sighting, and the number of people who reported sighting the object (among them a pilot), and their observations seem to indicate a creditable sighting that might be worth following up.
content.summary: "large silent object flying low and fast"

content.detailedDescription: My co-worker and i were seated at the desks that faced the huge glass windows. we were very busy. suddenly, a huge airship that was about 100 yards wide, rose from the thick trees about 60 yds in front of us.It was circular with pulsing,blue lights. it hovered above the trees. we both jumped up and screamed. as if it heard us, it made a complete rotation and zipped into the ground. when the other workers turned around to see what frightened us, it was gone. how could something of that size slam into the ground without a sound or a tremor? i don't know what it was, but i know what it wasn't.It was not of this world's technology.
content.summary: Co-worker and i saw large, rotating air ship with blue pulsing lights hovering above trees

content.detailedDescription:
I do not remember the date.  we were on the west side of the salton sea.  it had been dark for about 1/2 hour; we had just finished riding our dirt bikes.  i left the motor home to get in my truck to drive home.  i was admiring the bright stars.  in the southeast sky five lights appeared one by one.  they were high in the sky and in a straight line and the same distance apart.  the lights did not move at all and appeared for 30-45 sec.  i am guessing but the distance between the first and last light was about 1 1/2 miles.  the lights simply went out after 30-45 sec.

i immediately new the objects were foreign.  they lights were too straight, too bright, too far apart and did not move at all.  

i was very excited and yelled for my friend to get out of the motor home.  as soon as i heard the door shut was when the lights disappeared.  and of course he laughed when i told the story.  i never told it again until now.


thank,

kurt
content.summary: Series of lights appeared in the sky in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I'm 15, and me and my family went to las vegas for a week, after heading out of lv, we decided to check la out, so we headed out into the desert, forget with high way. but while looking north i saw this red dot come out of the mountains, and hover up into the sky quickly in 4 seconds. i was surprised and curious. 5 minutes later i saw, which looked like a meteor, and i was scared, i was stareing at it as it got closer and closer, it looked like some kind of fire ball. it moved slowly, and did not look like any military craft. and than it zoomed east, and dissapeared. it makes me wonder if life is out there, or if the goverment is inventing new space crafts, or flying old ufos.
content.summary: While vacationing at las vegas and heading to la, i spotted some werid things in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed asleep and was awakened about 245 am, i am a light sleeper by the sound of a fast moving air craft flying over my house at a high rate of speed. the object was emitting a loud sound that wavered from a high to a low pitch. it was moving from the north to the south at a high rate of speed. it was strange because there was no sound of an internal combustion engine or a jet engine. just the high pitched sound as it went overhead. this was followed by four or five jet aircraft that appeared to be chasing behind the object also going from north to south. i sleep with a bipap machine and and oxygen concentrator running in the room and both are fairly loud. i could hear the unknown object and the fighter jets easily above the machines.  i live a few miles south of the joint reserve naval air station in fort worth and jets fly over the house all the time but seldom at this time of the morning. i blogged about my experience on new years day and had written this off as a weird dream. at the time it was real enough i woke my wife up and told her about it. i would not have reported this but yesterday i saw the reports of the ufo seen down at stphenville tx and some of the witnesses reported they saw fighter jets in pursuit. that is exactly what i thought i heard new years morning and had told several people about and i feel this is an interesting coincidence?
content.summary: I can only report what i heard as i did not see anything of note

content.detailedDescription: When it began to pulse, i felt certain i was witnessing my second siting of a ufo and became very alert and interested.  i continued to watch it fade and the pulse to brightness, then remain quiet.  it never moved from its position about several hundred feet above lake champlaign across the water from oakledge park and its position between the two trees from where i was witnessing its activity.  i am certain what i was seeing was a ufo.  after watching for about 45 minutes, i became tired.  i went and made some tea, and when i returned, the ufo was gone. the entire time i was standing in a living room-basement with a huge array of windows spanning about 30 feet near the banks of lake champlaign.  i had been up for several hours listening to coast to coast(art bell).  i first noticed the object as it was brighter and bigger than any star out over the lake, and it was a fairly clear night.  my feelings: facination, wonderment, attempted to communicate esp/mentally.  wished contact.  have always believed i am part of the et nations in some way......
content.summary: Thought it was a plane landing when first saw it.  then noticed "landing lites" flickered occasionally.  then noticed the object remained in same position between two trees-  it did not move up nor down nor sideways.  it remained stationery.

content.detailedDescription: My recollection is very sharp, although it was a long time ago. when i was 9 years old, we were visiting my grandparents who lived in rural tennessee. there was a big open garden/field next to the house. sometime in the afternoon (well before dusk), i walked out to the mailbox, approximately 200 yards from the house. as i was getting the mail from the box, i looked up and saw an object slowly moving from left to right across the field. it was high, but i can't say how high. not as high as a plane would have been. the best way for me to describe the shape (i have never been able to accurately describe it) was like a square capital j, with the bottom part being wider than the side. there were multi-colored lights running along the bottom edge, flashing and looked like they were moving across the bottom. i stood for several minutes and watched as the object moved to the right (which would be north, northwest) and then stopped. i watched it as it stood still for several minutes and then it was gone. i'm not sure i had any specific thoughts of what it could be. i knew it wasn't a plane or anything else i had ever seen. my father worked at an airport, so i was always around differnt aircraft, and this was something new to me. i very much remember watching it in a sort of detached way, i just didn't know those words back then. since that time i have been drawn to stories of unidentified objects. i didn't see it speed off, and all these years i have assumed it disappeared. i haven't related this story to many people, and most think i was imagining things.
content.summary: Bright object seen over field

content.detailedDescription:
While living in ontario, or, on march 7, 2005 i took our dogs outside at 8:30pm to do there thing.  it was dark outside at this time of night in march.  while standing with my back to the east, something got my attention and i looked up over my left sholder to the south/east.  i dont remember hearing anything, but i looked back with a purpose.  about 1000 feet up and maybe two city blocks away i saw 5 round bright lights flying in what looked to be formation and spaced equally apart.  my brain worked faster than ever before trying to figure out what i was seeing.  i was in the air force for four years, and have seen dozens of different planes, from the f-117 stealth to the b-1 stealth. 

my first thought was that it was the wing of a big plane, like a b-2 bomber or something like that with lights running on the leading edge of the wing.  then reality came back to me when i didnt hear the loud sound of jet engines.  the lights were traveling in a east to west direction and a little to the north.  i stood there not knowing what i was seeing, and trying to listen for engine noise.  i heard nothing.  the lights traveled fairly close to right over my house.  i would estamate a speed of 100 to 200 mph, they were not going very fast.  they seemed to be going about the same speed as a jetliner comming in to land and very close to the airport.  

the lights continued on to the west/north west and when they got around 2 to 3 blocks away the leading light started into a circle, and the other lights followed it into the circle.  while traveling in this circle, they were not continuing to move to the west, they stayed in one spot while circling in the air.  the lights did one or two circles then continued on to the west/north west and finaly out of sight.

i would say entire thing lasted about 1 minute, but i could be off by 30 seconds either way.  

after the lights faded into the sky, i ran into the house to get my wife.  when i yelled for her from the back door, she knew something was up.  she said she could hear somthing in my voice.  once she got outside i told her what i saw.  the lights were gone, and she didnt see anything.

from the time the lights started to circle to the time my wife and i went back into the house the hairs on the back of my neck were standing up.

i cant say if this was an alien craft, but i can say for that it was not man made!!
content.summary: Saw 5 round lights at 8:25 on march 7 2005

content.detailedDescription:
I was trying to capture lightning from a distant storm. i was using 35mm film and a tripod bracketing exposures from 1 to 5 seconds. i had pointed my camera (nikon fm2) in the general direction from which the lightning was accuring. using a cable release to trip the shutter so that no camera shake would be transfered to the picture. when the lightning would flash i would trip the shutter. i had no idea that i was capturing anything other than the lightning until i got the film processed and printed. there are 3 clear images of what appears to be a ufo. i am a professional photographer and in no way have i manipulated or enhanced these exposures.
i can't remember the exact date when these were shot.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to my girlfriends house on the evening in question from the monroe county side of nepa, i approached the ski area)blue mtn.) from the main road leading towards the ski resort,( the access road goes over the blue mountain range and into the lehigh valley. i approached from the north facing the mountain,i noticed the ski resort mtn.  lights as i always do.I was about 2 miles away at this point. the area was just lit up to prepare for the upcoming ski season.At this time of the year though, their was still no snow , to the right of the  mountain,i noticed a sphere,perhaps the size of a car hovering over the entire mountain, it had lots of unusual lights and appeared to be floating very still. as i approached and closed in to 1 mile it darted into the mountain range and disappeared. i finally headed up the road a bit cautious and confused. i stopped the car to see if their was any damage along the road or if any of the lights i had seen leading up to the road were still in the area. nothing...I cleared the top of the mountain and noticed nothing at all.I was a bit hesitant to disclose this , but recent reports i have read have made me change my mind. i do not know aht to believe. i think if something was out there , it will be a matter of time before it makes another appearance.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Teardrop
content.summary: Flash of lights high in sky over ski area , sphere shaped and fast.

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were driving down i-57 at approx. 6pm near savoy/champaign, il.  it was stormy that day and there was a very low ceiling.  my friend was driving, i was looking at my phone in the passenger seat, and a 3rd person was in the back seat, when the first flash of light appeared.  the entire sky lit up.  the color was blue.  my friend said it was lightning, but the entire sky lit up.  and no thunder could be heard.  so we all paid attention and waited for the next flash.  about a minute later, the entire sky lit up a brilliant blue color.  i've never seen lightning that color, nor could it have been a plane.  if it was a plane landing at a local airport, the lights would have flashed more frequently.  i continued to watch the sky as we continued to drive north on 57, but i did not see the light again.

i then called my sister who is a student in champaign to ask if she noticed any flashes of light.  she said she did from inside her apartment, but she assumed it was lightning.
content.summary: 2 bright flashes of blue light occurred within minutes of each other, lighting up the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying in my small aircraft with my life partner cedric for a very special new years flight, when we encountered what we both determined to be a ufo.  although our encounter was brief, it is forever etched in our minds.  upon landing we seen a very large flying craft hovering along the airfield, and then it began to zig and zag as if the laws of physics did not apply.  fortunately, we had our video camera and we captured some very astonishing footage.  as of now, we are afraid to show our video to anyone, as we are already persecuted because of our lifestyle.
content.summary: Encounterd ufo while flying my small aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I had just spent some time on the colorado river and got back in my truck to head back to town. as i was driving i turned a around a bend and in front of me about quarter mile above a high red cliff were these very big and bright blue and green lights. i thought at first people must be up there. then i realized they were above the cliff and way too big for any humans to be setting up. the lights were too bright and not stationary for me to tell what was behind them. i got pretty excited and pulled my truck off the side of the road. i got out and watched. i stood there and the lights were kind of interweaving together but definately blue and green but not separate. i had a hard time with the perception to tell if it was right above the cliff or further away. if it was above the cliff then it would have been about 500 feet wide by 100 feet tall, the space the lights filled up. if it was further back it would have been massive. then as i was watching about ten minutes after i first saw it, it just zoomed up and away from me and dissappeared in about 3 seconds. completely gone . no sign of it. it looked like the lights just shrunk away into nothing. well that's it .....I was amazed and bewildered and excited all at once and sorry that no one elsewas on the road and had seen it, that i know of. i just wandered onto your sight now and thought even though it was some years ago i would tell of it now. i told a few of my friends and they didn't know what to think , but i know what i saw and it was not rational flight as we know it or was it something you would see in the sky normally.
content.summary: Blue and green lights hovering above the sandstone cliffs.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard, dog with me, when i heard a boomerang type noise with a fizzle.  i immediately looked up and saw a yellow/white softball size "meteorite" travelling from the ese to the wnw as fast as any other "meteorite" i've seen over the years, only this one stayed lit longer (8 sec.) and "i actually heard it" and it was a lot closer to earth. i immediately looked at my watch to record the time (9:48pm) and looked and listened to see if there was an impact close by....There was none.   i immediately called my father-in-law and told him what i just witnessed.  it was a unique experience, i thought, until i heard on cnn today that some folks from stephenville, tx thought they saw a ufo.   i am 100% positive that the people of stephenville saw the "meteorite" breaking up as it was falling to ground.  iwould suspect that you should be able to find the meteorite not too far to the wnw of that area, if you belive the person that said it was 300 feet up.??
content.summary: Heard a boomerang-fizzling sound, looked up to see a fireball from ese to wnw

content.detailedDescription:
It was a social night in the park for our pta meeting which brought parent and their kids.

it was evening dark probably between 7 & 9pm cst  i was just a youngester then 9-10 years old so year was either 1948 or 1949 (i think in the fall)
i was playing a 'hide & go seek' game...Hiding with a friend behind some pine trees (adults were there at the park for a parent/teacher meeting social.)

i happened to look up and saw 5-6 bright nearly round white objects (seemed at the time that they were about the size of half-dollars loosely left to right..They dispersed... we were in an undeveloped area (at that time)...Miles away from towns or developments. no one else including my friend, other kids or adults saw anything (a[[roximately 2-25 total at pta social).

i was stunned and it seemed like minutes at the time...But on reflection more likely 20-30 seconds seeing them. after seeing them grouped
i think breaking off from group going northerly and spreading out as they left. they were nearly if not stationary when i looked and saw them...They appeared to be about the size of 1/2 dollars or perhaps quarters. perhaps anywhere from 50 ft to 300ft high and impossible to remember or know how far away (perhaps 1/2 mile????Or more.

i was hiding behind a pine tree with a classmate....It seemed so long as i watched...Finally i realized something very unusual was happening and i remember nudging my friend...Bur by the time i did that ...They were gone.

at that time i had never heard of a ufo or 'flying saucer'...I told my folks later that night and they just thought i was 'seeing things'...Not...I have never 'seen' or 'imagined' anything else in my life. 

i didn't make a real big thing out of it...But in later years after i learned about ufos, i would bring it up from time to time to older friends and my folks (we no longer lived down there in the country).  my mother on her death bed in 1988...Told me among her last statements that "she was sorry that she had not believed me those many years ago." 

while that does not lend any credibility to my story...Her statement helped bring my concern to a closure!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: They were first grouped together looking like silver dollars or 1/2 dollars from the north

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright light that i thought was an airplane comming towards me because it was not moving. i saw it at least a mile away just off the left side of the interstate about 300 feet in the air. as i got close to it, i could tell that it was not moving. so i figured it must be a helicopter. as i got next to the craft i could see the shape of the object and it looked like the stealth bommer, but it was not moving at all. just hovering there. as i contunied down the interstate i lost sight of the object.
content.summary: Large object hovering near interstate 24 very bright light shaped like stealth bommer

content.detailedDescription:
This actually happened in 2006--didn't know where to report it. 

driving home from work (from delaware) traveling on i-95 northbound.  

about 6-7 miles from philadelphia airport i noticed an object cross over the road in front of me (at very fast speed-no noise). 

it moved incredibly fast--(fastest thing i have ever seen). 

the profile looked sort of diamond--tear drop shape (small-craft).  i was close enough to get the feeling that it had immense power resonating from it (and yes there were lights--but no noise). 

after crossing in front of me, it changed direction (again way to fast) and then sort of had a different shape--like a missle (cigar-shape...I guess) and was heading straight for philadelphia--following 95. 

i lost sight of it in seconds.  at this point i thought it was a missle heading for philly. i then proceded to call my friend about this--that's it--the truth!!
content.summary: Low flying and very fast--no noise that would be associated with speed

content.detailedDescription:
On 08dec07, my friend was taking pictures of the surf and cliff of cerro morillo on coffin island (isla caja de muertos), approximately 5 nautical miles southeast of ponce, puerto rico. no one sighted anything unusual during the daytrip to this island. however, upon receiving her pictures back from the developers, she noticed the strange object in the upper right portion of the picture. it appears to be symmetrical and disc-shaped.

the photographer's immediate reaction was that it was a ufo. in fact, she was so concerned about the object that she kept quiet about it for several days before forwarding it to a few people for their opinion. i have zoomed in on the object several times in an effort to "debunk" it, to try to see if it might be a bird, hat, frisbee, kite or anything else, but i cannot based soley on its appearance.
content.summary: Disc-shaped ufo caught on camera

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck in my backyard with my cat on my lap. it was late, and very dark. there wasn't any noise. i was just admiring the clear sky. suddenly, my cat began to get very tense. his claws tightened and his ears went back on his head. he turned to look over my shoulder, so i turned as well. i gasped as i saw a ufo maybe 100ft away, hovering at maybe the height a helicopter would. it wasn't making any noise at all and just hovered. it was a disc shape, very flat, and very illuminated. i stood and walked to the closest edge of my deck, and in a blip, it was gone. i was shocked and a little scared, and my cat was still in a panic.
content.summary: Low flying ufo seen in my backyard, not a sound, dissapeared quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I went out for a smoke as i always do after dinner, when i looked up i saw an object in the night sky that seemed brighter than the stars around it, and began to watch it. it started to make sharp turns and would jump forward two to three times, then it would turn in a circle i then called my wife to show her and it kept on doing the same thing. we watch it together for at least ten minutes together as it kept on doing the same thing. i would go out every ten minutes to see where it was, and it kept on moving it that way toward the western sky toward my house. i kept watching it over the next few hours checking on it every ten to fifteen minutes. when i looked out again at
11pm it was gone. during this time there was another bright object in the southern sky that had bright pulsating lights that would or should i say seem to change size as its lights pulsed. both objects disappeared when i went out to check on then at 11pm. both my wife and i agreed that we are not alone, and i am certain that we do not have any kind of aircraft that can do what i say last night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Caught site of object in the southestern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to the dogs all barking and sounded like there was something wrong jumped off the couch looked at the time and noticed a lot across the lot. thought it was strange to see a light appear on the ground almost oval looking and extremly bright .

i ran outside it was cold up to the fence 30 ft from light light bounced from one end of the lot to other. looked up no sound no aircrat scared me dogs going wild all around got 2 ft from light ran inside grabbed my husband it was gone... called police reported strange light and asked if any one has reported this strange light women on phone adviced me to call the local police... weird but interesting. wanted to see more and get into the light...
content.summary: Woke to dogs barking all dn st. saw bright light coming towards the house thiought it was a car got up closer to see it was a beam of light coming from the sky above (like a flashlight)  huge light no sound or aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and another deputy were just leaving a call when we both yelled at the same time, "what the hell is that". following, we observed a very bright object approx: 500-1000 feet off the ground, moving at a high rate of speed. the object appeared to have a "light" trail of approx 10-20 feet behind it. as we pulled our vehicle to the side of the roadway, the object climbed approx 20-50 feet at which time continued south at an even faster rate of speed. the object made no noise and had no additional lights or insignias. 


note-i have been a police officer for 10 years and a private pilot for 15 years and have never observed anything like this!
content.summary: Very bright-low flying-fast-looked like a falling star!! however, object was approx 100 yards in front of us and tracking horizonal with the trees then climbing up!

content.detailedDescription:
Taking pictures of christmas lights and set up the camera for a low light night shot. while out shooting multiple pictures of house, saw something out of the corner of my eye but dismissed it, when i got home i downloaded the photos and notice the streak on the one since i take in very high resolution i blew up the photo and looks like a disk that came down left to right then made a turn.
i do not know what it is however i was standing in the driveway of the house and sanford international airport is about 5 miles away and orlando international is about 20.... 
any help would be appreciated?
content.summary: Like a comet or shooting star that turned

content.detailedDescription:
January 14th 2007
approx 6:23pm  - 6:50pm
approx 18:23  18:50

this report would made to ufosnw on january 17th 2007.
i was in carrboro, nc at the exit ramp of hwy 40 and hwy 86. i was casually picking a real estate sign and looking at the clear sky.Suddenly i saw something moving at what looked like the speed of a military jet. but after it travelling about 3 inches from my view it stopped in mid air. i continued to watch it and it did not fade. instead it changed directions and started moving perpendicular, back and forth as though oscillating. it then started to make odd movements hooked shaped movements with sudden stops and  reversing, then forward movements darting the eratic movements before it went futher to the right. i tried to call several friends to see. one of the first came out of her house in durham,nc. i told her to look up and to the left of those three bright stars almost in a vertical straight line. i told her to watch that star sitting alone by itself. after a few seconds (more like 10 seconds) i asked her to tell me what she was seeing, she said the star is moving up and down. 

this sighting lasted around 30 minutes before it continued to my right which i think was east. and gradually faded. my friend got frightened and went back into her house. i could not tell any shape. it just
looked like a star (dot) in the sky. it was clearly visible but not the
brightest object in the sky. in fact it passed just below the brightest 
object from my perspective. i have never seen anything move as eratically not change flying directions immediately, no wide turns or anything. just go to one way and immediately retrace its direction back. then back and forth then move forward a little more make different motions and hook like motions and thenmove across the sky and start bouncing (oscillating movement) again until it went off to the east and faded. and not in its original direction, about 60 degrees to the left. i do not know what it was but i have never seen  anything move like it.
content.summary: Streaking star like object would stop and change directions

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry but i've been photographing and studying these flying craft for over a year i
know a lot about them. the story would take to long. so let the pictures speak 
for themselves

shot in 2007 to 2008
content.shape: Cross,  Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other
